sentences.en: Demon cat and dopey dog are dashing into the roadway.
sentences.cn: 这只精猫和傻狗正冲向马路.

sentences.en: Did you notice that your larynx dropped when you used this dopey tone ? Good.
sentences.cn: 你有注意到当你用这种懒散的感觉发声时,喉结降下来了么?

sentences.en: He doesn't understand half you say to him; he seems to be dopey.
sentences.cn: 你对他说的话他一半也没听懂, 他似乎很迟钝.

sentences.en: I felt dopey and drowsy after the operation.
sentences.cn: 手术后我感到迷迷糊糊，昏昏欲睡。

sentences.en: I'm feeling really dopey this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天上午我一直昏昏沉沉的.

sentences.en: That was a dopey thing to do.
This stuffy atmosphere makes me feel dopey.
sentences.cn: 这沉闷的空气使我昏昏欲睡.

words.tran_cn: 迟钝的；愚蠢的；被麻醉的
笨蛋；麻醉药物；涂料；vt. 上涂料；服药；vi. 吸毒；吸毒成瘾；（俚）酷毙了
迟钝的；被麻醉的；呆笨的
